::Hot Rod::

Hot Rod was able to avoid the grenade, but was hit with the sonic blast,
and shots to his leg. He went down..., hard.
"Arrrrrgggg!" He let out, in pain.
"Vehical mode." Hot Rod transformed to his sports car mode, fired all
thrust rockets, and headed for the lead BH.
